climatePledgeFriendly.details: Pre-owned Certified: Electronics products are inspected, cleaned and (if applicable) repaired to excellent functional standards. Buying Pre-owned extends a product's life, reducing e-waste and raw material extraction.

body.description: Galaxy S21 Ultra 5G for T-Mobile is crafted so you don’t need to choose between video and photo. With a single tap, you can pull super-clear stills straight from high-resolution 8K video. Or if you’re looking to capture stunning photos, the 108MP camera feels like you’ve brought your own professional studio with you. Galaxy S21 Ultra 5G, designed to be epic in every way.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent condition. Like new. Great battery life. Excellent camera and operation.
reviews.reviewText: My habit is to purchase phones after they have reached their point of peak popularity in order to get reduced pricing. This item was received in like new condition. The screen was spotless. The hardware and software work seamlessly together. The processing power is very impressive. The camera is unbeatable for any phone manufactured up to the point this one was manufactured. This phone by far out does the newer Moto g I had purchased and was using this phone to replace.The only thing I do miss is the SD card slot, however, I have developed some understanding as to why a phone manufacturer might prefer not to have it. I have gotten used to managing my photos and videos using Google photos more effectively.I am 100% satisfied. I will continue to use this phone for quite some time so long as I can avoid damaging it of course. Anyone looking for an excellent quality phone with an amazing camera for a great price will definitely find it here.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this phone almost 30 days ago. It's a great phone. Looked brand new. No scratches at all. Works great. I'm very surprised it was Refurbished.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Not a scratch.
reviews.reviewText: This review is for the (Samsung Galaxy S21 Ultra 5G | G998U Android Cell Phone | US Version Smartphone)sold by thegadgetdeals. If I didn't know better, I thought it was brand new phone. Not a single scratch on the front screen, camera Lens, sides, corners or back. 100% perfect condition. Came with 65% charge. Brand new fast charger and USB-C cable and no directions but Samsung has the PDF file (G998U). Well packaged and protected in a generic cardboard box. For $392 bucks it was a good buy. My Excellent condition (Refurbished) was actually in Premium condition.Remember to NOT remove your OLD sim card from your OLD phone before calling to activate the new phone. It will delay the activation and you will have to start over if you chose to go that route.If I have any issues in the future I will update this review.I almost forgot. My phone came with 98% battery life remaining vise the 80% minimum promised as measured using the android AccuBattery app. You have to charge your phone to 100% and let it run down below 15% a few times for an accurate reading.Am very, very satisfied. Oh, was delivered 5 days early also. (insert smiley face here :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Great phone but one of the things that i didn't like was that it had scratches on the screen when i received it. it performs well as a new phone. Please invest in a product that removes scratches on your phones before you sell them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: If you're looking for a flagship phone that's affordable. The s21 Ultra is perfect it may be a few years old, but that don't matter since it outperforms most new iPhone at a fraction of the price. I'm currently using it right now to type this out. Excels in every aspect imaginable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars I would never buy from this seller, it says it's backed by Amazon but it is not!
reviews.reviewText: There were no pictures of the actual phone had a ding in the bottom corner and scratches on the screen! I started using it, I love the Samsung S21 Ultras, so I wanted to use it and keep, I noticed that it gets heat up in the warm weather and in my pocket sometimes, I did not think of it much then it started echoing and I did not notice this right away because I mostly used it on Bluetooth in my car or at home, when reached out to the seller for warranty, he said I have to send the phone back, I asked for a replacement not money back, I explained I can't because I need my phone for my work and I cannot be without a phone for 3 or 4 days why does not he do what other sellers do send the new phone and then I can send this one back, they refused, Amazon said no problem will get you a replacement or money back but they just stalled till Warranty was over now they deny the claim! This is horrible customer service!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Dude mucho en pedir este celular tenia miedo de que fuese un fraude o que llegara defectuoso. Pero al recibirlo me quedé sin palabras esto no es un equipo renovado es un equipo nuevo llego en su caja original aun con sellos y al sacar el celular grande fue mi sorpresa pues traía todos losbstickers de protección el de la pantalla en las cámaras y al reverso por igual es la mejor compra que eh realizado repito recibí un equipo nuevo que yo estoy estrenando
